alert.note: Alert for Custer; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 8:36PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Custer, northwestern Powder River and central Rosebud Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 834 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms north of Ashland and near Brandenburg, about 20 miles east and southeast of Colstrip, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashland and Brandenberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Rosebud
